page.title: 13Farming
page.content: Farming is the main occupation around Pitlessie.There are three farms in Cults parish,the largest being {Priestfield}which deals mainly with sheep and grain. There are several other farms around Pitlessie village which have different animals and crops. The largest, {Ramornie Mill}has many cattle and grows mixed crops.Many of the farms adjacent to{Kettle Produce}grow vegetables for them. Except for some hill land to the south used for grazing,much of the land is intensely cultivated because it is situated on a fertile plain.
